text.description: A handsome Georgian style residence offering substantial accommodation on a plot approaching three quarters of an acre, enjoying an excellent location close to the heart of Virginia Water village. Bel Air is a uniquely designed home which was completed for the current owner in 2009; the property boasts excellent, well planned accommodation on all four storeys and in our opinion the architectural design of the facade is simply exquisite. Property such as this is a very rare commodity.

Lease Length:
Break Clause:
Service Charge:
Rateable Value:
Rates Payable:

feature.heading: Lounge (Reception)
feature.description: 10.00m x 3.00m (10yds 2' 10" x 9' 10") Front aspect bay window with original window furniture - enjoying an attractive vista of front courtyards and gardens. This attractive sized reception room features an impressive Edwardian archway which gives access to a solid marble fireplace with Edwardian style fitted gas fire with tiled surround, stone hearth and ornamental brass footplate. High smooth finish ceilings with cornice, decorative door furniture, picture rail, radiators.

feature.heading: Kitchen
feature.description: 12.00m x 4.00m (13yds 4" x 13' 1") This attractively presented luxury fitted kitchen features 'gothic style' solid Maple units with Granite worksurfaces. Extensive range of eye and base level units with one and a half bowl stainless steel sink unit with mixer taps and cupboards under, recessed enclosed storage space for fridge/freezer, plumbing for dishwasher, recessed and fitted gas range style cooker with 5 ring hob and dual oven and grill under, matching range of units with Granite worktops, space for breakfast table, attractive bay window with side views of the gardens, door giving access into dining room, stripped and polished wooden floors, smooth finish high ceilings with coving and decorative wall paintings, picture rail, recessed lighting, door giving access into Utility room.

feature.heading: Bathroom
feature.description: 'White' suite comprising panel enclosed bath, separate corner fitted shower cubicle, pedestal wash hand basin, obscured glass sash window to side, part tiled walls, high ceiling with recessed lighting, wall mounted heated towel rail.

feature.heading: Bedroom
feature.description: 7.00m x 9.00m (23' x 29' 6") Side aspect with attractive elevated tree lined vista, radiator, inter-connecting door giving access into master bedroom, smooth finish high ceilings with cornice and recessed lighting, picture rail, door giving access into en-suite.

feature.heading: Bedroom
feature.description: 7.00m x 9.00m (23' x 29' 6") Accessed from galleried first floor landing and inner lobby. Attractive bay with sash windows, extensive range of triple fitted wardrobes with pigeon storage cupboards over, smooth finish high ceilings with cornice, picture rail, telephone point, radiator.

feature.heading: Bedroom
feature.description: 6.00m x 8.00m (19' 8" x 26' 3") Accessed from galleried first floor landing. Door giving access into inner lobby. Master bedroom enjoys an attractive panoramic vista of front courtyard and gardens, original Edwardian style fireplace, sash windows, door giving access to balcony, attractive polished wood floors, telephone point, radiator, picture rail, smooth finish ceilings with cornice and recessed lighting. Inter-connecting door giving access into guest suite.
